name: Wii U Homebrew Bundle
summary: Learn about .WUHB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In September 2022, developer Maschell released the Aroma Wii U homebrew environment. Among other things, this environment allows users to load homebrew applications saved as RPX or WUHB files directly from their Wii U's home menu. The WUHB format was released alongside Aroma.

Unlike RPX files, WUHB files can include more than just a homebrew application's executable. They can also include additional assets, metadata files, instructions, images, and other data. For example, a WUHB file can include an app splash screen, an app icon, and a metadata file that lists the app's author and version.
NOTE: Homebrew developers can create WUHB files using the wut (Wii U Toolchain) homebrew development tool.

description: A WUHB file is a Wii U Homebrew Bundle. It is an archive that contains an .RPX application, as well as associated assets and metadata. WUHB files can be loaded on a Wii U with the Aroma environment installed.

instructions: WUHB files are meant to be opened on a Wii U with the Aroma environment installed. To do so:
Transfer your WUHB file to your Wii U's SD card.
From your Wii U's home menu, select and open the app your WUHB file contains.
